sect2.para: The Yaboot package contains a PowerPC Boot Loader for machines using OpenFirmware such as NewWorld Macintoshes.

seglistitem.seg: Bash, Binutils, Coreutils, Diffutils, GCC, Glibc, Grep, Make, Ncurses, and Sed
